name: A-Cornered
description:
Controls:

Hold A to run clockwise around the inside of the tree.

Hold D to run counterclockwise around the inside of the tree.

Touch controls are available, and these controls also work with mouse clicks.

Hold on the left side of the screen for clockwise movement.

Hold the right side of the screen for counterclockwise movement.

The goal is to survive the onslaught of icicles, snowballs, and a pesky pillbug for as long as you can.

A game created over 1 weekend for Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "Stuck in a Loop".

Design and artwork done by myself and my wife, Lindsey.  Made with the Construct 3 game engine.
